Name:
HMS Calpe
HDMS Rolf Krake
Identification:
pennant number: L71
pennant number: F342
Fate: Sold to the Royal Danish Navy in 1952 and renamed Rolf Krake. Scrapped in 1966.
Armament:
6 × QF 4-inch (100 mm) Mark XVI guns on twin mounts Mk. XIX
AAA - 2 x 4 12.7 mm Vickers, 2 x 20 mm Oerlikon guns
6 Thornycroft depth charge throwers
